Title: GBM Solution
Notes: Explicit solution to the GBM SDE.

Title: Itô's Lemma (Univariate)
Equation: df = (\frac{\partial f}{\partial t} + \mu \frac{\partial f}{\partial x} + 0.5 \sigma^2 \frac{\partial^2 f}{\partial x^2}) dt + \sigma \frac{\partial f}{\partial x} dW_t
Notes: Chain rule for stochastic processes; includes convexity correction.

Title: Itô's Lemma (Multivariate)
Equation: df = \frac{\partial f}{\partial t} dt + \sum \frac{\partial f}{\partial x_i} dX_i + 0.5 \sum_{i
Category: j} \frac{\partial^2 f}{\partial x_i \partial x_j} d\langle X_i
column6: For multi-asset options; includes correlation terms.

Title: Girsanov Theorem
Notes: Defines measure change for risk-neutral pricing.

Title: Feynman-Kac Theorem
column5: Links PDEs to Expectation of stochastic processes.

Title: Ornstein-Uhlenbeck Process
Notes: Mean-reverting process used for rates and volatility.

Title: Fokker-Planck Equation
Equation: \frac{\partial p}{\partial t} = -\frac{\partial}{\partial x}[\mu p] + \frac{\partial^2}{\partial x^2}[0.5\sigma^2 p]
Notes: evolution of PDF; used for local volatility.

Title: Tanaka's Formula
Notes: Decomposition for non-smooth functions; introduces Local Time.

Title: Bond Pricing Risk-Neutral
column6: Fundamental no-arbitrage pricing for default-free zero-coupon bonds.

Title: Yield to Maturity
Notes: Internal rate of return for bond investment.

Title: Macaulay Duration
Notes: Weighted average time to cash flows.

Title: Modified Duration
Notes: Percentage price change for unit yield change.

Title: Convexity
Notes: Second derivative of price w.r.t yield.

Title: Nelson-Siegel Model
Notes: Parametric yield curve model (Level Slope Curvature).

Title: Bootstrap Method
Notes: Recursive extraction of zero-coupon rates from coupon bonds.

Title: Hull-White Model
Notes: Time-varying parameter fits initial yield curve.

Title: HJM Drift Condition
column7: No-arbitrage condition for forward rate drift.

Title: Swap Valuation
Notes: PV of floating minus fixed legs.

Title: Swaption (Black)
Equation: V = Annuity \cdot [ S_0 N(d_1) - K N(d_2) ]

Title: Merton Equity Value
Equation: E_t = V_t N(d_1) - D e^{-r\tau} N(d_2)
Notes: Structural model treating equity as call on assets.

Title: Default Probability (Merton)
Notes: Risk-neutral probability of firm value < debt.

Title: Survival Probability
Notes: Probability of no default up to time t.

Title: Conditional Default Prob
Notes: Probability of default conditional on market factor.

Title: Garman-Kohlhagen
Equation: C = S e^{-r_f \tau} N(d_1) - K e^{-r_d \tau} N(d_2)

Title: Commodity Forward
Notes: Includes storage u and convenience yield y.

Title: Black-Scholes PDE
Equation: \frac{\partial V}{\partial t} + 0.5\sigma^2 S^2 \frac{\partial^2 V}{\partial S^2} + (r-q)S \frac{\partial V}{\partial S} - rV = 0
Notes: Fundamental PDE for vanilla European options.

Title: Black-Scholes Call
Equation: C = S e^{-q\tau} N(d_1) - K e^{-r\tau} N(d_2)

Title: Black-Scholes Put
Equation: P = K e^{-r\tau} N(-d_2) - S e^{-q\tau} N(-d_1)

Title: Theta (Call)
Equation: \Theta = -\frac{S e^{-q\tau} \sigma N'(d_1)}{2\sqrt{\tau}} - r K e^{-r\tau} N(d_2) + q S e^{-q\tau} N(d_1)

Title: Margrabe Exchange
Notes: Option to exchange one asset for another.

Title: Dupire Local Vol
Notes: Implies local vol structure from market prices.

Title: Heston Model SDEs
Notes: Stochastic volatility model with mean reversion.

Title: Euler-Maruyama
Equation: S_{t+1} = S_t + \mu S \Delta t + \sigma S \Delta W

Title: Crank-Nicolson
Notes: Finite difference scheme for PDEs (2nd order).

Title: Expected Shortfall
Notes: Mean of tail losses (coherent risk measure).

Title: Black-Litterman
Notes: Bayesian update of market equilibrium with views.

Title: Kelly Criterion
Notes: Optimal size to maximize log wealth.

Title: Rough Heston SDE
Equation: V_t = V_0 + \int K^H(t-s)\kappa(\theta - V_s)ds + \int K^H(t-s)\sigma\sqrt{V_s} dW_s
